resources.string: Calligraphy is the art of beautiful handwriting and is available at where Memories Are Made. Come in to see the variety of ways you can use this elegant craft for your special ocasion and how we are keepeing calligraphy alive.
\'\'In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.\'\' Coco Chanel
Tired of common fonts? Try Calligraphy. Don\'t get stuck. Dare to dream.
